statements: DELETE FROM PatientHealthData WHERE age > 50 AND weight <= 70;
DELETE FROM PatientHealthData WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND last_checkup_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM PatientHealthData WHERE blood_pressure = 'High' AND heart_rate > 80 AND potential_health_risks LIKE '%diabetes%';
DELETE FROM HealthRisks WHERE patient_id = 5 AND risk_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM HealthRisks WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE patient_id = 1 AND condition_id = 2;
DELETE FROM risk_factors WHERE patient_id = '0e18fd63-74e9-4bbe-96cc-19813e2e94ce' AND risk_level > 3;
